DDL.statement: CREATE VIEW [dbo].[VIEW_JOURNEYS] AS SELECT JOURNEY_REF, STATUS, DESPATCH_NO, TIMESLOT, LOCATION_ID_TO, DATE_UPDATED, LOAD_TYPE, LOAD_TYPE_DESC, HAULIER, CONCAT(convert(varchar(25), timeslot, 120),' ' , LEFT(ISNULL(LOAD_TYPE,'') + SPACE(10), 10), ' ', LEFT(ISNULL(LOAD_TYPE_DESC,'') + SPACE(20), 20), ' ', LEFT(ISNULL(HAULIER,'') + SPACE(20), 20)) AS DESCRIPTION FROM dbo.APP_JOURNEY WHERE STATUS = 'Unassigned'
